articles.title: “It’s been bothering me for ages” - AB de Villiers baffled with criticism of Hardik Pandya for leaving Tilak Varma “stranded” on 49* - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Former South African batter AB de Villiers has been surprised at the amount of criticism that was directed at Hardik Pandya after he hit a six in the third T20I against West Indies, with Tilak Varma u
